keyMoments.title: Franky Bets on the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: After burning the Pluton blueprints, Franky explicitly states he's betting entirely on the Straw Hats' victory to save Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the faith Franky has in the crew, foreshadowing his eventual joining.

keyMoments.title: Dramatic Assault on Tower of Justice
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats use the Rocketman to crash into the Tower of Justice, beginning the final phase of the rescue mission.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's determination and creative problem-solving in rescuing Robin.

keyMoments.title: CP9's Five-Year Mission Ends in Failure
keyMoments.description: Franky burns the Pluton blueprints that CP9 had spent five years trying to obtain through their infiltration of Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: The destruction of the blueprints represents the complete failure of CP9's long-term mission.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Supports Rescue Mission
keyMoments.description: Zambai and other Franky Family members participate in the assault on Enies Lobby, with Zambai using his Kaitai Buttagiri technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Franky Family's commitment to helping rescue Robin and supporting the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Assists in Rocketman Assault
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family participates in the dramatic assault using the Rocketman train to crash into the Tower of Justice.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates their alliance with the Straw Hats in the rescue mission.
